manual.description:
Open your network router setup and check the client list. The Daikin AC should appear in the list with the format DAIKINXXXXXX.

Note - To find the Device Key, open the Daikin Smart AC mobile app and navigate to Menu → Integrations → Home Assistant. Enter the SSID (DAIKINXXXXXX) and press Submit.
manual.title: Setup Daikin Smart AC

reconfigure.description:
Enter the Device Key for SSID: {hostname}.

Note - To find the Device Key for the SSID shown above, open the Daikin Smart AC mobile app and navigate to Menu → Integrations → Home Assistant. Enter the SSID and press Submit.
reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Daikin Smart AC

user.description:
Enter the Device Name and Device Key for SSID: {hostname}.

Note - To find the Device Key for the SSID shown above, open the Daikin Smart AC mobile app and navigate to Menu → Integrations → Home Assistant. Enter the SSID and press Submit.
user.title: Setup Daikin Smart AC
